content: We are requesting a grant of 20k USD from the Ethereum Foundation, but we are open to discussing different grant amounts that align with our project goals and budget. While the grant amount is important, what is most important to us is making Ethereum Mexico a reality and creating a valuable experience for the attendees. We believe that this event has the potential to make a significant impact on the Ethereum ecosystem in Mexico, and we are committed to making it happen regardless of the grant amount.
